Test Name: Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) RNA Detection and Quantification by Real-Time RT-PCR
Purpose: To detect and quantify Hepatitis C Virus RNA in serum for the diagnosis and monitoring of HCV infection.
Container: Sterile serum tube (clotted whole blood collection tube)
Equipment: Real-Time PCR thermal cycler, centrifuge, vortex, micropipettes, laboratory refrigerators/freezers
